Token.Abstract: This class provides utilities useful to all unit tests based on the Salesforce SDK
Loads a set of auth credentials from the 'uitestcredentials.json' file located in the bundle associated with the given class, and return a dictionary of login info

Parameter.Name: testClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class associated with the bundle where the test credentials file lives.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a dictionary of login username, password, url

Token.Abstract: Loads a set of auth credentials from the 'test_credentials.json' file located in the bundle associated with the given class, and configures SFUserAccountManager and the current account with the data from that file.

Parameter.Name: testClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class associated with the bundle where the test credentials file lives.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The configuration data used to configure SFUserAccountManager (useful e.g. for hybrid apps which need the data to bootstrap SFHybridViewController.

Token.Abstract: Performs a synchronous refresh of the OAuth credentials, which will stage the remaining auth data (access token, User ID, Org ID, etc.) in SFUserAccountManager. populateAuthCredentialsFromConfigFile is required to run once before this method will attempt to refresh authentication.
